title: Life is StrangeBefore the Storm Remastered Free Download
description:
Life is Strange Before the Storm Remastered game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRIP
Life is Strange: Before the Storm returns with remastered visuals across characters & environments. Set three years before ‘Life is Strange’, you play as sixteen-year old Chloe Price who forms an unlikely friendship with Rachel Amber, a beautiful and popular girl destined for success. When Rachel learns a secret about her family that threatens to destroy her world, it is her newfound friendship with Chloe that gives her the strength to carry on. No longer alone the girls must confront each other’s demons and together, find a way to overcome them.

system_requirements.Processor: AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.2 GHz / Intel Core i3-2100, 3.1 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: Radeon R7 250x, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 460, 1 GB
